website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking a rustic farmhouse frame will find their match in this beautifully distressed letter board.
pros: Comes with 350 characters, including letters, numbers, and even emojis
Hand-distressed frame offers incredible quality in materials and construction
Includes both a frame stand and a sawtooth hanger for various mounting options
cons: Product is inconsistent due to the hand-distressed design

customer_reviews.title: Most Complimented Piece
customer_reviews.text: I love being unique so this beautiful grey felt letter board gives me the freedom to write anything I want while looking classy! The board and frame are well crafted and the letters are easy to work with. They stay snug inside their spots and plenty of room for longer phrases. I get compliments on my letter board all the time! Best impulse buy ever! Here’s a pic of what it currently says as I decorate for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: High quality board w/ so many letters!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rustic board with a huge variety of letters & emojis. ♡ this will be a fun family addition during the quarantine. Everyone gets a quote a week...not sure this is a good idea w/ teen boys.😳 All the same, this is a high quality felt board w/ a huge variety of letters! So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ily

customer_reviews.title: Cute but was defective &takes some time and work to cut letters
customer_reviews.text: I liked the board until I found a small defect in the felt—there is a flap of felt fabric hanging on the bottom, so I’ll need to send it back. The color is true to the picture and I like the emojis. Note: it does take time to cut out all the letters. That was a little time consuming and annoying. My hands got tired. The letters were flying all over th room as I cut them off the plastic sheet they come on. I wish the letters simply came pre-cut and ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and adorable. Just as pictured. Came with plenty of letters. Those are obnoxious to cut out, but I don't intend to do that all at once, just as needed. Letters stay put. Now I have a cute place to put my favorite quotes instead of on a post-it on my mirror. I also ordered this company's matching 12x16 gray felt board for special occasions, and though I have not pulled it all out, it looks to be just as good quality as this one. I would buy this again. Would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: KaraDub

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the letter board. I was worried because of some of the reviews but the packaging secured it and it wasn't broken. I have a rustic/industrial feel to my home and this piece fit right in. The removal of the letters and symbols was a little tedious but nothing crazy. It was easier to remove them by hand and twist them until they broke off than use the scissors (I did use the scissors for the smaller pieces.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute! Love this board!
customer_reviews.text: Love this letter board! It’s very cute and rustic looking! The picture on Amazon doesn’t do it justice. I like it cause it’s not too heavy to hang it with adhesive strips on my pantry door. It’s a real wood frame and the paint looks great. They provided a lot of letters and shapes to use. I wish this company came up with holiday colored shapes and letters to add to this board.
customer_reviews.author: Kris10

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I got this board for my college apartment and it looks very nice. There are a lot of letter and symbol choices to choose from (my favorite being the coffee cup ones). The letters stay in the felt board well. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the letters do not come precut. You have to cut them and a small plastic tab that holds them together apart and that took me a while.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Best Letterboards on the Market
customer_reviews.text: This letterboard is so beautiful!! Well constructed, high quality and a stunning soft pink color!! Highly recommend! Update: I own almost all colors of FCHG boards now, and they are all STUNNING!! The colors, craftsmanship and style are all incredible. Cannot recommend these letterboards enough!! I also own one of their tiered trays and it is my favorite!! I have it in black, but will be purchasing the other two colors as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Severs

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Addition!
customer_reviews.text: You can add this to just about any room to bring some fun or inspiration to it! I use it as a Friends quote board in my office. I bought this as a Christmas gift for my sister in law and after putting a message on her board before wrapping it, I fell in love with it and decided to buy one for myself! It is a fun and cute decoration piece!! There are so many cute symbols or emojis that you can use as well. Update: still love the board!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Warmels

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product!! I used it as a birth announcement and am using it as his weekly/ monthly picture! Great quality and large variety of symbols and plenty of letters for whatever you may want to write. I would highly recommend a letter organizing box though! I do like the bag included though in the meantime!! (Or don't tear off all the letters and just tear as you need them)
customer_reviews.author: Annie W

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this to use for a kitchen decor when we have friends and family over. We put different quotes and song lyrics on the board every time someone comes to visit! Our friends that saw this have loved this so much, we bought 3 more to gift to friends and family! Highly recommend! Very cute and rustic!!
customer_reviews.author: Aziz & Giana

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute
customer_reviews.text: With all the craze of the felt letter boards I had to get one. I put a cute saying and have it in with the picture frames and decorations in my living room and I love it. Pinterest has a ton of captions to put on the board so I can easily change it out. I will probably buy another one to gift.
customer_reviews.author: Bijon Lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect deep red letterboard
customer_reviews.text: I love this letterboard. I was looking for a deep red. Not the bright red most have. I got just what I wanted. It is very rustic. It comes with so many letters it’s crazy! Great gift or great for decorating. I can’t wait to use it for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decor
customer_reviews.text: The perfect rustic farmhouse decor. A good size to fit in a gallery wall, hang by itself on a small wall, prop up without hanging, or used as a prop in pictures. The amount of letters, numbers, and symbols is crazy (in a good way)! The possibilities with this one are endless.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Letter Board
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this letter board! It's small but perfect. I bought this at the last moment in anticipation of our daughter's arrival. I didn't necessarily care for other styles I've seen that look too commercial, like they should be hanging up at the DMV. This one is the perfect blend of rustic and modern. Comes with a great variety of letters and special characters. We'll use this for special occasions for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne J.

customer_reviews.title: The first one I received had the felt vertical instead ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and distressed look of this board. The first one I received had the felt vertical instead of horizontal and it was unable to be used based on where the stand and hanging notch was. I returned it and ordered another. The 2nd one was made correctly. Now, it's tons of fun to create new messages anytime I'm feeling creative. Makes a great prop for pictures. Definitely a 5 star 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.author: S Kruk

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift !
customer_reviews.text: This letter board inside the Amazon box is sent gift giving ready. It is packaged in a very cute box and just needs to be wrapped. Letter boards are very popular but, this letter board is trimmed with a white distressed frame. There is a plastic stand attached to the back of the frame for displaying. If you are wondering if the 10 x 10 size is big enough, I personally think it is the perfect size. The board is so cute, I ordered one for myself also! I would definitely recommend this as a perfect gift for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy S.

customer_reviews.title: Still a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these before, since I like to use them as cards for high school graduations as part of dorm preparation gift basket. I was excited to get this and started breaking off all the letters before I noticed the frame is not quite in the best shape. I’ve attached the pictures to show where there’s a gap on both the top right and top left corners. I still think they’re a good buy, just hoping this is a one off occurrence which will hopefully go unnoticed as part of the rustic theme.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: It looks and feels really cheap. The letters/symbols are flimsy. Came faster that stated though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We used it as a baby announcement board for pictures! I love the frame. Great quality will reuse for other things! Comes with a TON of letters and a nice storage sack. I used sizzors to seperate the letters much faster than twisting them apart.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Quotes for days
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old wanted a felt board and I kind of have a rustic thing going on through out the house so I snatched this one up. I LOVE it and even questioned whether I was going to give it to her or keep it for myself, lol. She loves putting weekly quotes on it and I love seeing what she writes. Good quality board. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted one for a while and I’m glad to find one that fits my shabby chic aesthetic. I keep it on my entertainment center and change the quotes almost every day. It’s a fun little game for my husband and I to go back and forth with the messages to each other too
customer_reviews.author: Allison Smith

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!! What I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I love this board! Came with a ton of letters/numbers, I keep it on display with new sayings on my front entrance table. I found a stand at hobby lobby that I like a little better than using the one on the back of the actual board-but the one on it does work well & is sturdy. Good quality, would definitely recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina820

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous quality and so pretty
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a letter board to display in my salon for 6 months , I was so excited to see this cute " Joanna Gaines " style . I was blown away by the quality, honestly the price had me wondering until it arrived. It is so nice , so well crafted that it seems like you'd purchase it from a craft fair . I can't wait to write fun sayings each week for our clients to read or post about products. This is definitely the nicest letter board I've come across from anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Erin C.

customer_reviews.title: You will love this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for maternity pics for my daughter to use as an announcement board and this is awesome! The quality is amazing and there were plenty of letters/numbers to use. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: LaWanda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Felt Board💗
customer_reviews.text: I love this board for my baby girl that I got from @feltcreativehome on their shop I found on @amazon 💕 Their products are pictured exactly from amazon and such a beautiful product. So sturdy and you get so many letters it’s perfect 👌
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: This letter board was exactly what we were looking for to announce the new addition to our family! It came with a variety or letters and symbols, as well as a little sack to keep them all in. It did not come with a letter organizer, so if you are looking for one, order separately. This product exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Becca T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Felt Board!
customer_reviews.text: I love this felt board! It will be so useful at home, for trips, for events, and my work. It came with all the letters, numbers, and symbols I need. It fact I’ve already set aside a few phrases for upcoming things and I have plenty of letters/numbers left over. I’m using it as a Disney countdown currently and the letters/numbers are holding in place nicely!
customer_reviews.author: CSR

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, so many letters included!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my moms birthday, and she really loved it. The original lengthy quote she was aiming for had so many vowels in it, but this kit supplied every single one!! We have no worries about running out of letters. We love the worn farmhouse look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy Staple
customer_reviews.text: These letter boards are my favorite! They come with so many letters and always packaged so nicely. It has a plastic stand attached on the back, along with a metal clip to hang from a wall. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sori

customer_reviews.title: Broke first day of use
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute board, but the stand attached to the back is plastic and it broke within 24 hours :( :( We used this for my son's first birthday photo shoot and the plastic stand attached to the back broke in-transit. Although it's cute, I would buy something cheaper (so many alternative options out there) to make sure you get your moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this board! I was thinking the letters would be a different material, instead of hard plastic, but they still work great and they look good on the board. I just had to get used to it at first. You get plenty of letters, which I really liked and also the flowers and hearts, and emojis are nice to make the board more fun. Overall, I really like it and I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Replace stand is essential.
customer_reviews.text: The stand for this product was broken. Also the paint job on the frame was not up to my expectations. I had ordered another one of these and the quality was much nicer. I would at least like a new stand otherwise the product is useless.
customer_reviews.author: J&B

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars, but the letters don't separate from the plastic "spine" (as I'll call it) very well. It leaves too much of the attachment on the letter itself, which shows up on the board.
customer_reviews.author: EternalCrown

customer_reviews.title: Great board for the price
customer_reviews.text: After reading numerous reviews on felt boards, I picked this one. It arrived on time and was packaged well. I used a good pair of snips, as some of the reviews suggested, and had no issues trimming the letters/symbols. It takes a bit of time to cut the letters, but it wasn’t horrible. The board overall was of good quality. I originally bought this as a gift and am now purchasing a second one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Letter Board Love
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting a long time to order a letter board and this one did not disappoint! The quality is amazing and the board itself is lovely. The letters come apart easily, are sturdy, and go into the board smoothly. There is even a cute bag included to store all the letters! I cannot wait to begin styling my board and using it my decor!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Muniz

customer_reviews.title: Super nice felt board
customer_reviews.text: The product is just like the picture, super cute, very well made with good products and can be used so many ways! I personally have used it for my pregnancy announcement and set it on my mantle after. My friend is going to use it at her wedding, it can be made to be more classy or for something fun. It has plenty of letters, numbers and other shapes, it is very pretty, I would definitely buy again from this seller. If you’re looking for a good product buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lowther

customer_reviews.title: Heirloom quality - fun to use!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this board. It’s by far the highest quality and most stylish of all the boards I’ve seen around local retailers. I want to order more. It’s super sturdy and comes with tons of letters and emojis! Can’t thank you enough! I’ll be back!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great letter board!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this letter board! Arrived quickly and as described. The board came with plenty of letters, emoji's, cute characters and the board is just the right size too! The letters can be stored in the included drawstring bag which I keep tucked behind the board. This board is a cute accessory to add a little whimsy to your home decor!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this letter board
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this Black Felt Letter Board with Rustic White Wood Farmhouse Vintage Frame and Stand. Once I popped all of the letters out of the mold, I separated them by type into a little divided box to make it MUCH easier and quicker to change out the phrases.
customer_reviews.author: Christi E.

customer_reviews.title: Top quality.
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful. It has so many letters and characters. I am very impressed by the quality of the product. I would definitely buy this again for another gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, cute and creative product! Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing felt letter board! It’s the perfect size and comes with tons of letters, words and symbols! I bought one for my daughter’s dorm room, loved it so much, so I bought one for myself, then 2 more as gifts. It’s a great price and the quality is top notch! You can also follow them on Instagram and get tons of ideas! Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great, but be ready to file.
customer_reviews.text: This felt board is adorable! There are plenty of letters and other cute inclusions for the board. My only issue was the letters. Once removed from the plastic strip they came on they have a sharp plastic tip that I had to cut/file down to keep from snagging the board and scratching my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and trendy
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as Christmas gifts to friends and family. I also kept one for myself. This is well constructed and beautiful. We are having so much fun sharing messages from our boards with each other. This is a great gift for any age group.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! And the price was good, too. I love it for photos. I'm considering buying letters in black and gold and some script words and so forth, to augment the letters and emojis that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of letters and the felt holds well
customer_reviews.text: I like the rustic or shabby chic look of this board. The felt holds the letters well. I feel there are plenty of letters to display a short or longer sentence. I use mine for positive thought reminders! Much cuter than the old sticky notes on the mirror approach.
customer_reviews.author: Rm

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this board! I can hang it on the wall or use the stand to prop it up, and the distressed white finish is super farmhouse-chic! My only complaint is that the narrow letters like "L's" and "I's" sit a little crooked. But it's minor. Cutting out the letters was easy with my sharp scissors. The box it came in is gift-giving friendly. Very nice value!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Fangman

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a letter board that fit the style of my home (modern farmhouse) for almost a year, then when I saw this one I knew it was perfect! And I was not let down. The quality is great, and it comes with SO many letters and emojis, I barely know what to do with myself! If you're wondering where to buy the perfect letter board, this is definitely the place!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Moore

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love love this!!! The only drawback was it did not come with a snipping tool to get the letters off the molds.. I had to use scissors which was awkward. The board itself and the letters are perfect though!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah gordon

customer_reviews.title: Cute board, I love mine!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, white washed board that isn’t huge and exactly what we needed. The letters are annoying to get off the tabs, but I believe they all come like that when you first order. The felt board is nice and holds the letters snuggly. Overall a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: The perfect addition to welcome guests when they stay over! I did have to go back and trim each letter with scissors after popping each letter off, but it’s worth it. The reason I gave 4 instead of 5 stars is because the stand in the back is a little flimsy, would be happier if it was more sturdy but it’s totally worth purchasing and for the price - YOU CANT BEAT IT!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful letter board
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this board for a mimosa bar at my daughter’s baby shower. It came with a large amount of letters which is always a plus! My other daughter liked it so much, I purchased one for her college apt. It’s well constructed and is a very pretty piece.
customer_reviews.author: andrew&melissa

customer_reviews.title: Quality and cuteness!
customer_reviews.text: My first letter board! Loved it so much I have already ordered four more!! The distressed frame is so charming and the letter board with stand...I LOVEEEEE the stand! Everything is excellent quality, service is personal, professional and I’m waiting for the next color release!!!! Obviously I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ksunshine713

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for open houses!  Or as a gift! :)
customer_reviews.text: I use this for open houses to highlight certain aspects of the home. Sometimes, a rustic message board blends so much better than a tent card. - This is a great gift to give for a new baby as the family can use it in photos to mark milestones! - I removed a star for peeling/flaking paint.
customer_reviews.author: JanVB

customer_reviews.title: I’m absolutely obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this message board! It arrived in perfect condition and it is so very cute! I love love love the rustic, antique farmhouse style frame. Comes with a ton of letters and a cute little pouch to hold them all. Packaging was perfect, I’m absolutely obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: CKosmetics

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great deal on this board! It’s so chic and perfect for pictures and content creation!
customer_reviews.author: Christian S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: This sign is fantastic!!! I’ve had it for a couple of months and I’m loving it. Very well made, and great for gifting!! I’m going to buy more for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: April Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love this letter board! The slightly distressed white wood frame makes it fun and unique. I’ve used it continually since purchasing it. We have it on our china hutch in the kitchen and each week I’ll put a funny or inspiring quote on it or it’s fun to make special occasions like birthdays, holidays, etc.... I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this felt board! I love how rustic it is and that it has so many letters, numbers, and emojis. It came nicely packaged and is high quality. The letters were a little hard to detach but scissors worked well. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Perfect letter board for kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I love this in my home! Great quality for the price and more decorative than other boards I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: JKH

customer_reviews.title: SO. FREAKING. CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this board! It’s the perfect size and the additional letters provided are great so you don’t have to worry about buying more. I would surely buy this again for myself or as a gift. ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!!
customer_reviews.text: Delightfully happy with this little board. Feels like a million characters are included. Perfect for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Blackdog 1920

customer_reviews.title: Even better than the picture!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It came and was better than the picture! It comes with so many letters and emojis! Love it! I found wall decor and mounted the frame onto it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Really cute!
customer_reviews.text: I found out about these felt boards through a friends wedding registry and loved it so much, I bought one for myself. The rustic frame just adds the best touch, considering other felt boards on Amazon are a bit cheap looking. This board also came with added letters and cute emojis. If you’re considering adding a bit of flair to your home or photographs, this board is the one to pick. ✨
customer_reviews.author: Reppy

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these letter boards as Christmas gifts. I even got one for myself. Everyone has enjoyed them, especially my grandchildren (ages 11 & 8). They love creating inspirational quotes. The only downside is the letters come connected to a plastic frame. One has to remove each letter or character individually. It can be time consuming to cut each one & trim the plastic tabs. Otherwise, I would have given this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! It's got the distressed look and looks amazing on my floating shelf in my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Cyn Gantan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I love it! Made our 3rd pregnancy announcement that much cuter. Love this! It’s now a staple in our kitchen with different quotes.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This letterboard is so cute! The pink is perfect and the distressed frame is just right. I can't wait to use it for my little girls birth and room. I would totally recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a holiday gift for a friend... but I might just have to keep it for myself, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Allie Peak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Lots of digits.
customer_reviews.text: Average. Not as durable as you would think. Color is off. Still cute idea. Gave plenty of letters and digits.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: The cutest letterboard
customer_reviews.text: I love this letter board. I have this one & the larger one. Makes a great display & have not seen any others like it.
customer_reviews.author: L SUT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm collecting a bunch of letter boards, and buying them all from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Vanloo

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest, little message board. I ordered two accidentally (guessed I loved it that much) but rather than returning one, I gave it as a gift. Everyone who has seen it has commented on it. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Misty D. Lo

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks so cute! Love that I can easily update what it says :) Seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: GnarlyCharlea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought this I use it from my IG post and it is so cute I love the rustic look to it in the chic feel of the pink!
customer_reviews.author: Rosina

customer_reviews.title: Pink Felt letter Board
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t for sure I was going to like the felt board. It’s absolutely adorable and so glad I ordered. It’s perfect for a baby shower. I’m going to order another for my toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Exactly as shown in photos! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Good, sturdy quality! Have received numerous positive comments. Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my felt letter board and it got here super fast!! It’s exactly as described and great quality!! I had a couple questions and Britney replied super fast and was very helpful and sweet... I will be posting photos of it in use as soon as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Eleina V

customer_reviews.title: No Letters!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this 3 stars because although the board looks great, it didn't come with the letters it said it was to include. Very upset! I don't want to return it because I love the board, just super irritated it didn't come with the letters.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Lacivita

customer_reviews.title: I love this board!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this board. I use to welcome company and put out at community gatherings!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL & High quality felt board!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS FELT BOARD! Love the rustic look with the pink felt! Great quality! Lots of letters and number and symbols plus a cute sack to store them in. I bought this to make a sign for my Poshmark closet and it is exactly what I wanted! Fast shipping and packages securely! Thank you so much for making an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Comes with ample amount of letters
customer_reviews.text: This worked for exactly what I needed it for. I like the rustic look. It also came with plenty of letters, unlike reviews I read for similar boards.
customer_reviews.author: Chelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The frame is sturdy and well made. There are plenty of letters/symbols to write anything. The white paint is very delicate and vintage looking. The letters stick to the board very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hhall

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this! It holds up great! I’ve got so many compliments on it already. It comes with plenty of letters and symbols I was not expecting! It even has a nice bag to hold them all in one you use them! The words are super easy to put on and they don’t fall off!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen H.

customer_reviews.title: Farmhouse Chic!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect edition to my farmhouse décor. I purchased it to put uplifting quotes to start our day off on a positive note and to remind us that there is always something good, even on the hardest of days and it is perfect! I could not be happier. It is sturdy, can be hung or set up on it's stand, overall great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Lujan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful letterboard
customer_reviews.text: Love my letterboard! Took some time removing all the letters, but I love the variety and the quantity. The board itself is great quality and I love the rustic look.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I added some flowers in the corners of the frame. Cute addition to my kitchen. I think you’ll be happy if you purchase
customer_reviews.author: Christina McClendon

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating!!
customer_reviews.text: Upsetting my mom opened it on Christmas and there was no letters 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has always wanted a message board and loves this one! Well built and comes with ample letters to display the daily love notes, quotes, and messages. The board is perfect size for the countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Heath M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, comes with a ton of letters and emojis
customer_reviews.author: Ame

customer_reviews.title: Great find !
customer_reviews.text: Really cute for the guest room assignments ... plan to hang these on the doors! With letters in the room so they can leave a goodbye note.
customer_reviews.author: User1124

customer_reviews.title: Adorable felt letter sign
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It’s adorable and so easy to change the letters and sayings. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for one of these with a farmhouse feel
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle P

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this letter board. It’s so awesome! The color is beautiful. The right amount of distressing on the frame. Love that it had a stand on the back so I don’t have to lean it against something. I’ll totally be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Barry and Jammie Clark

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this...bought for a friend. Price lowered by $4 day after I rec'd mine or would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this. I bought it for a friend. I want one for myself now. Price lowered by $4 day after I rec'd it or would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and It is adorable! This company also has as excellent customer service as they do a well made product! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: House warming gift
customer_reviews.text: My clients love walking into there new homes with a customizable gift like this. Great gift for any occasion, the possibilities are endless.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it! Looks really cute in her grey and blue room and is fun for her to change the sayings. Nice quality, rustic looking frame!
customer_reviews.author: Julie H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Presentation!
customer_reviews.text: The frame is shabby chic and the entire board is very well made. TONS of letters and other symbols are included. I love this board! Fast shipping, too!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Nelson

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Currently using as our wedding countdown, but once the wedding is over this will without a doubt display cute messages on my counter everyday!
customer_reviews.author: anne a.

customer_reviews.title: We just adore this letter board, and it’s even nicer in person!
customer_reviews.text: We just adore this letter board, and it’s even nicer in person! Could not be happier with the quality. My family and I are having fun writing notes to each other on it! Would make a great housewarming gift and would go well with almost any home décor, even our modern kitchen! Highly recommend if you’re looking to really make a room your own.
customer_reviews.author: mdgrwl

product_meta.title: Gray Felt Letter Board with Rustic White Wood Farmhouse Vintage Frame and Stand by Felt Creative Home Goods | 10x10 Inch Antique Changeable Message Board 350 White Alphabet Letters, Numbers, Emojis
feature_bullets: 🔳🌟 EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY, HANDMADE FELT LETTER BOARDS. Felt Creative Home Goods stands by their name and reputation. Our custom design allows for an authentic farmhouse shabby-chic feel. These premium quality patented frames are built to last and HAND DISTRESSED to make each piece unique! (US Patent No. US D851,172 S)

💌 ENDLESS CREATIONS: Self-expression has never been easier! Your decorative message board comes with 350 ¾” White Letters, Numbers, Punctuation, and Emojis! Our characters are high quality and stay put. Complimentary BURLAP SACK included to neatly stow letters. Pre-installed Stand for upright positioning as well as Sawtooth Hanger for seamless wall decor!

📸 SOCIAL MEDIA DYNAMITE! Our eye-catching letter boards help Capture and Caption real life moments. Includes “hashtag” and “at” symbols! and the ONLY company to include beloved ☕COFFEE☕ emojis!! Home Decor and Mommy Bloggers love us!! Be part of the Felt Creative community - Share Creations and Explore Inspirations with #JustFeltCreative

🎁 PERFECT GIFT FOR ANY OCCASION: Provide the gift of self-expression and the ability to make moments memorable. Perfect for adding meaning and inspiration to everyday, Special Occasions, Announcements, Baby Reveals and Milestones, Back to School, Showers. This versatile piece is perfect for holidays, weddings, birthdays, nursery, stores, restaurants, classrooms, home or office decor! A Farmhouse & Cottage favorite!

💖👫🏼 SUPPORT SMALL FAMILY BUSINESS: Owned, operated, and custom designed by two highschool sweethearts who CARE about their customer satisfaction and community. Have you met Britney? 💁🏻‍♀️ Join our fun decor community today! @FeltCreativeHome - Stop Waiting & Start Creating!
